title: Enchanted Grounds - Littleton
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Coffee shop and game store. Food is not made-in-house; rather they bring in mostly locally made food and the coffee is all locally roasted. The coffee shop offers soy, almond and coconut milk. All syrups are vegan and gluten free. The Ghirardelli chocolate sauce is vegan as well. Many food options for vegans including world b'eatin' basil cilantro and almond pesto fettuccini; mame's vegan rice and bean burritos; wild thyme veggie wraps; salads and more. Staff is friendly and knowledgeable.
